commit message:
remove IOException from Session API; wrap instead

- report getCause() for RainwaveException when it exists

check http response code for authentication reponse

fix issue #26
do less validation of API key
also clear the current session when clearing preferences
add a little hint about a forbidden key
calculate a drift between server time and client time

apply server time drift to countdowns

fix issue #25
apply time drift to vote deadlines

use known_event_id when possible

This allows server to rush a schedule update if desynchronization occurs.

fix issue #24
